you_have_completed_this_step.description: The text that notifies the student that they have completed the step

current_possible_score.description: The text 'Current Possible Score:' that shows the score that the student can receive when they answer correctly

check_answer.description: The text for the button to check the answer

try_again.description: The text for the button to try again when the student answered incorrectly

save_answer.description: The text for the button to save the answer if there is no correct answer

edit_answer.description: The text for the button to edit the answer if there is no correct answer

this_is_attempt_x.description: Message to display to student which attempt they're on

you_received.description: The text 'You received' to show you received x points

points.description: The text 'point(s).' to show you received x points

you_have_selected_too_many_please_select.value: בחרת יותר מידי אפשרויות. יש לבחור רק
you_have_selected_too_many_please_select.description: The text that tells the student they have selected too many checkboxes

you_have_not_selected_enough_please_sele.value: בחרת פחות מידי אפשרויות. יש לבחור
you_have_not_selected_enough_please_sele.description: The text that tells the student they have not selected enough items

choices.description: The text 'choices.' to tell the student they have

you_have_completed_this_question.description: The text that tells the student they have completed this question

please_review.description: The beginning of the text that tells the student to please review a previous step before trying again

before_trying_again.description: The end of the text that tells the student to please visit a previous step before trying again

you_must_visit.description: The beginning of the text that tells the student to please visit a previous step before trying again

auto_graded_score.description: The label for the auto graded score in the grading view

take_me_there.description: The button text 'take me there' to show students when they answer the Challenge Question incorrectly.

close_dialog.description: The button text 'close' to close the dialog.

back_to_cq.description: The button text 'Back to Challenge Question' to bring student back to the Challenge Question step.
